page.title: 10STOCKPORT COUNTY A.F.C.
page.content: Stockport County is a very small football club and its ground is called {Edgeley Park.}Although the ground holds many more, the average crowd for a home game is about 2000. At the moment they are in the{Fourth Division of the{Football League.}The ground has very many rooms. The medical room is very important for injured footballers. In the dressing rooms of the home team they have a big sunken bath with fitted showers but in the visiting team's rooms the bath is smaller and they have fewer showers. The team has some fairly good players in it, although at the moment the club is not having much success. Now that the football season has ended, a lot of work is taking place at the club, such as redecorating and general ground repairs on the stands and terraces.
